org.kepler.monitor.figure

Class BaseFigure

  • java.lang.Object
    • diva.canvas.AbstractFigure
      • diva.canvas.AbstractFigureContainer
        • diva.canvas.CompositeFigure
          • org.kepler.monitor.figure.BaseFigure
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    diva.canvas.CanvasComponent, diva.canvas.Figure, diva.canvas.FigureContainer, diva.canvas.FigureSet, diva.canvas.VisibleComponent, diva.util.UserObjectContainer
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ProgressBarFigure, QualityFigure, StateFigure

    public abstract class BaseFigure
extends diva.canvas.CompositeFigure
    A base class for some of the offered figures.
    Author:
    Carlos Rueda

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  BaseFigure.Orientation
      Two possible orientations for a monitor figure.

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update()
        Updates the GUI according to the current state of this monitor. It calls _update on the AWT event thread.

      • getOrientation

        public BaseFigure.Orientation getOrientation()
        Returns:
        the orientation

      • setOrientation

        public void setOrientation(BaseFigure.Orientation orientation)
        It only sets the orientation indicator.
        Parameters:
        orientation - the orientation.

      • _update

        protected abstract void _update()
        A subclass implements this method to do the actual update of the this figure. This method is called by update() on the AWT event thread.
